TopicTitle: How do I set myself into a polar orbit at 100km usesing cheats (what are the numbers i put in?)

Articles.Content: I want to know how to do it with cheats (cause my ship wont takeoff)

Alt-F12 menu, I assume?

The two values you care about (other than SMA of course) are Inclination and LAN.

Inclination needs to be between 80 and 100 to scan for ore. If you want perfectly polar, make it 90.

LAN just play with. Go into map mode, bring up the cheat menu, and change it a few times and see what it does.

(Actually you can do that with all values and see what happens)
